universum.studios.android.setting.key

Class SimplePreferenceScreenKeyModificator

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.setting.key.SimplePreferenceScreenKeyModificator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreferenceScreenKeyModificator

    public class SimplePreferenceScreenKeyModificator
extends Object
implements PreferenceScreenKeyModificator
    A simple implementation of PreferenceScreenKeyModificator that uses PreferenceKeyModificator supplied to SimplePreferenceScreenKeyModificator(PreferenceKeyModificator) constructor to perform modification of preference's key for all preferences associated with preference screen passed to modifyKeys(PreferenceScreen).
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface universum.studios.android.setting.key.PreferenceScreenKeyModificator

        EMPTY

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimplePreferenceScreenKeyModificator(PreferenceKeyModificator modificator)
      Creates a new instance of SimplePreferenceScreenKeyModificator with the specified preference key modificator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int modifyKeys(PreferenceScreen preferenceScreen)
      This implementation simply iterates all preferences of the specified preferenceScreen and calls PreferenceKeyModificator.modifyKey(Preference) for each one of them.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimplePreferenceScreenKeyModificator

        public SimplePreferenceScreenKeyModificator(@NonNull
                                            PreferenceKeyModificator modificator)
        Creates a new instance of SimplePreferenceScreenKeyModificator with the specified preference key modificator.
        Parameters:
        modificator - The desired modificator that should be used for preference key modification.

    • Method Detail

      • modifyKeys

        public int modifyKeys(@NonNull
                      PreferenceScreen preferenceScreen)
        This implementation simply iterates all preferences of the specified preferenceScreen and calls PreferenceKeyModificator.modifyKey(Preference) for each one of them.
        Specified by:
        modifyKeys in interface PreferenceScreenKeyModificator
        Parameters:
        preferenceScreen - The preference screen where to modify keys of its associated preferences.
        Returns:
        Number determining count of preferences of which key has been modified. If no modification has been performed by this modificator then 0 is returned.
